text: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā evarūpāpi bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe
edit: Santi bhikkhave bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpannā avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyanā – evarūpāpi bhikkhave santi bhikkhū imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe

translations.transtext: Monks, there are monks in this group, [who are] those destroying the [lower] three fetters of rebirth, those reaching the stream, normally not falling down, certain for enlightenment eventually. Monks, there are such monks also in this group.
